body: An addin for checking up EnergyPlus geometry's property details. [Tutorial link.](http://www.mpendesign.com/plugins/how-to-check-energyplus-objects-property-before-simulation/) Download: [EP_Property 0.2](http://www.mpendesign.com/plugins/ep_property-0-2-now-available/) [](http://i0.wp.com/www.mpendesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Capture-3.png?w=1630)[](http://i0.wp.com/www.mpendesign.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Capture-4.png?w=1480)

replies.body: Hi Mingbo, What do you think about adding this as an option to askMe component? We can add a Boolean to get the verbose report for the surface or the construction. What is the input F in your component?

Yes, that will be great, I was looking for this in askMe at beginning. input F is the idf address (just had an idea that getting idf address automatically instead of an input from user).

So the EP_info output is always the information that EnergyPlus is going to use for simulation.
